ver-create-name-desc: This will be used for reference only by yourself and the credential holder.
ver-create-description-desc: Describe the purpose of the credential request for both the requester and the credential holder.
ver-create-credential-desc: A verification can return as either valid or invalid. Define what constitutes a valid verification. Fields must match the credential schema exactly.
ver-create-reusable-subtitle: Create a verification link that can be used multiple times by different users
ver-create-reusable-item2: Same link can be shared with multiple users
ver-create-single-use-item2: Each link can only be used once
ver-create-single-use-item3: Ideal for sharing links with specific individuals
